steps.step: Shred surimi and place in bowl.Slice avocado in half and twist to open. Carefully Lodge a knife in the seed and twist to remove.Score avocado into 1 inch by 1 inch sections and spoon into bowl.
Add tomato, onion slivers, and cilantro.Squeeze 1/2 lime over the salad.Salt and pepper to taste.Stir well and serve.
